posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Baker  PSA-2   SOLD.  Thx
posts.post_content:
A very nice Baker, undergraded in my opinion.  Nice corners, nice picture, clean Turkey Red advertising back.  Bright whites!

I am asking $315, shipped and insured.

Thanks,
Craig

Many more nice Turkey Reds available at [url]www.t3turkeyred.com[/url]
